channel.title: Search on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Search on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Search Page
item.description: SPECIFICATIONS - SEARCH PAGE Search As a merchant, I want to make sure visitors can find the product they are looking for on my online store. A table lists all the aliases defined by the merchant. He/she can add and edit aliases. Add an alias Clicking ‘Add new alias’ or on the ‘+’ icon on the top right-hand corner of the table should redirect to a new page, where there are two fields to fill:
